snippet: Gary McKinnon, a British hacker, will not face trial in the U.S. because of concerns for his health. Does the British decision to block his extradition mark a broader victory for anti-extradition campaigners?
abstract: Gary McKinnon, a British hacker, will not face trial in the U.S. because of concerns for his health. Does the British decision to block his extradition mark a broader victory for anti-extradition campaigners?

headline.main: In Latest Extradition Battle, a Victory for British Hacker
